name: Mobile Friendly Twenty Ten
author: Guy Shaked

sections.description:
Mobile Friendly Twenty Ten helps make websites and blogs running the Twenty Ten Theme – responsive.
This is done by installing and moving from Twenty Ten theme to Twenty Eleven, which by installing the
Mobile Friendly Twenty Ten plugin is made to much look like Twenty Ten.
Since Twenty Ten is fully responsive, the resulting website is sort of a responsive Twenty Ten theme.

Mobile Friendly Twenty Ten Needs Your Help

It is very hard and time consuming to continue development and support for this free plugin without support from users like you.
If you have enjoyed using Mobile Friendly Twenty Ten pluging and have found it useful,
please consider making a donation.
Your donation will help us further support the plugin’s development and better its user support.
sections.installation:
1. Upload and select the Twenty Eleven theme through the ‘Design’ menu and ‘Themes’ submenu in WordPress.
  2. Upload and activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Release date: 2017-06-16)
  • Checked for latest version

1.0

  • Release date: 2015-09-05)
  • Status: Beta
